Author: phmwls
Text: that’s exactly how my family is. they know about my ed though (or at least they did, i moved out) and i tried to calm their nerves by sharing pictures of healthy meals i cooked but I’d always get the “you’re always eating the same thing, you need more variety, that’s too much fat, not enough protein, that’s too little, that’s too much, etc, etc” what i do now is tell them of the meals “i ate” but really they’re just meal examples i find on food pyramid whatever’s, like, “oh yea, for breakfast i totalllly had a yogurt with granola, a banana, hash browns, oatmeal, and sausage”

Author: IDKijustdrinkhere
Text: Jfc. No wonder you have an eating disorder. Idk how old you are, but I hope you don’t have to live at home much longer.
